item.title: 4 Reasons to Love & Use More Than One DAW
item.description:
4 Reasons to Love & Use More Than One DAW

The DAW wars continue to rage on, even in 2016, at a breakneck pace. Pro Tools vs. Logic vs. Ableton vs. Cubase and the like continue to dominate the blogs with impassioned defenses and rebuttals on all sides.
